verses.roman:
tāṅra mukha dekhi' hāse śacīra nandana
aṅgīkāra jāni' ācārya karena nartana

synonyms: tāṅra mukha—His face; dekhi'-seeing; hāse—smiles; śacīra nandana—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; aṅgīkāra jāni'-understanding the acceptance; ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; karena—performed; nartana—dancing.
translation: Seeing the face of Advaita Ācārya, Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu smiled. Understanding that the Lord had accepted the proposal, Advaita Ācārya started to dance.
